item.title: Security Tools
item.description: Tools and technologies I have experience with but not limited to: Microsoft: Azure, o365, Exchange Admin, Purview, Defender for Cloud App. Trend Micro Suite: Vision one, Tipping Point IPS, Deep Discovery suite, Email Security, Apex One, Cloud App, Deep Security. CyberArk: privilege Access Manager (PAM), Vendor remote access (Alero), Endpoint privilege Manager (EPM). Git Wireshark Zscaler BurpSuite

item.title: Resume
item.description: Resume Mohammed Abdulkadir! Background I am an experienced security specialist with a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and a Master’s degree in Cybersecurity. My work involves architecting, implementing, and testing new security tool features, as well as proactive monitoring for malicious activity, detection, and incident response, including addressing insider threats. I also have experience in web development, using web technologies to upgrade or build websites for small businesses. Born in Nigeria, I have developed strong cultural fluency through living and working in Canada and the United States.
